title: France panorama. [No. 72/32]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Safety on the road - radio guiding. Park sculptures - art and environment. 2. The earth’s resources - detection from above. 3. Kandinsky - exhibition at the municipal modern art museum.4. Les Marottes - marionette show.
